thread.title: Moment boozed-up Danny Dyer suffers meltdown at NTAs & has to be calmed by EastEnders cast as actor told to sort out wild lifestyle
thread.title_full: Moment boozed-up Danny Dyer suffers meltdown at NTAs & has to be calmed by EastEnders cast as actor told to sort out wild lifestyle

author: oloveridgegreene
title: Moment boozed-up Danny Dyer suffers meltdown at NTAs & has to be calmed by EastEnders cast as actor told to sort out wild lifestyle
text:
TV Magazine DYERED AND EMOTIONAL Moment boozed-up Danny Dyer suffers meltdown at NTAs & has to be calmed by EastEnders cast as actor told to sort out wild lifestyle 
Cockney actor, who plays Mick Carter in the BBC soap, was said to have 'kicked off' after the awards bash last month Exclusive BY LAUREN PROBERT AND SIMON BOYLE 19th February 2017, 10:32 pm THIS is the moment EastEnders bosses knew ranting Danny Dyer needed to sort out his wild lifestyle. 
A video clip shows boozy Dyer, 39, having to be calmed by co-stars in a meltdown after the National Television Awards . 14 James Bye (left, who plays Martin Fowler) and Danny’s wife Joanne Mas (right) intervene 
Witnesses have told how EastEnders stars had to step in as raging Danny Dyer “kicked off” after an awards bash. 
An onlooker who captured the dramatic scenes on her phone said: “You could tell Danny had been drinking. The whole thing lasted about 15 minutes.” 
Another source said: “The actors got together as a group to rally round Danny. 14 Hug . . . Danny calms down with soap star pal James 
“It was like they were thinking, ‘S*** we’ve got to calm him down’ because he was really kicking off. 
“It was obvious he was going off on one. He was really animated. His partner was also trying to calm him at one stage as well.” Danny Dyer as landlord Mick Carter standing next to co-star Annette Badland who plays Aunt Babe in the soap 
The final straw is believed to have come at the National Television Awards on January 26. 
Dyer, 39, had tried to give up alcohol but was back on the booze. 
He arrived at 6pm and saw red at the end of the evening. 
Pals including Jane Beale actress Laurie Brett and James Bye, who plays Martin Fowler, can be seen in the video footage trying to help the fraught star. Fame Flynet The 39-year-old has recently announced he will be taking a break from the soap to sort out ‘issues’ Fame Flynet The soap star started to become restless once he was tired and eager to go home 
James wraps an arm around party-loving Dyer , who waves his hands as the debate turns increasingly heated. 
His wife Joanne Mas, the mother of his three children, can also be seen attempting to get him to cool down. 
The woman who took the film said: “You could tell Danny had been drinking. The actor enjoying a bev alongside co-star Lacey Turner who plays Stacey Fowler in the soap Danny Dyer, who plays Mick Carter on EastEnders talks to The Sun at the NTAs Fame Flynet 14 Dyer smoking with Pixie Lott at the National Television Awards 
It seemed like he was annoyed at someone else and ranting, and his cast mates were trying to calm him down. 
“It went on for quite some time. At one stage he walked off in a strop and then came back. 
“Then the guy who plays Martin Fowler was trying to reason with him and at one point Danny Dyer hugged him — in that way that drunk people do when they are having a bit of meltdown and going from anger to love.” Rex Features Dyer was said to be one of the last one to leave the NTA bash last month Capital Pictures The £400,000-a-year star was said to 'see red' at the end of the evening Do you want Danny back on Albert Square? #SAVEDANNY 
A source recalled: “He was one of the last to leave. There was no one in their seats anymore. 
“To be fair, prior to it happening Danny had been to some of the crowd and had been taking pictures with the fans.” 
Friends of Danny, paid a reported £400,000 a year, insisted his frustration came from being held up in his bid to leave the event. RELATED STORIES ‘A WELL DESERVED REST’ Danny Dyer’s fans inundate him with messages of support after he leaves the UK following forced EastEnders break FLYING SOLO Danny Dyer leaves the UK and flies to South Africa alone after being forced to take a break from EastEnders 'I’m God here' EastEnders bosses forced Danny Dyer to take break from the soap after months of violent mood-swings on set with cast complaining he 'walks around like he owns Albert Square' DIAMOND GEEZER Danny Dyer has sensationally QUIT EastEnders - here's all you need to know about him dyer alarm EastEnders' Danny Dyer on the brink as pals fear booze and drugs are taking their toll WALFORD IN CHAOS EastEnders crisis as Danny Dyer's exit destroys storylines including Whitney Carter's 'pregnancy' Don't do one Dyer EastEnders cast fear Danny Dyer will quit soap after bosses force party animal actor to take a break Rex Features Dyer boozing it up with Towie star Kirk Norcross Getty Images 14 The 'exhausted' star is expected to take a six week break to sort himself out 
A pal added: “It had been a long day for him and he was obviously tired and eager to go home by that point. 
“His friends and co-stars were assuring him he could be on his way soon.” 
The “exhausted” star is expected to be away for around six weeks to tackle his personal problems amid claims there had also been fall outs at home.
